    • Uses of HPEntityInterface in harrypotter

      Classes in harrypotter that implement HPEntityInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HPActor  
      class  HPEntity
      Class that represents inanimate objects in the Harry Potter world.
      class  HPLegend
      This class represents "legends" - major characters - in the Harry Potter universe.
      Methods in harrypotter that return HPEntityInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HPEntityInterface HPActor.getItemCarried()
      Returns the item carried by this HPActor.
      Methods in harrypotter that return types with arguments of type HPEntityInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static EntityManager<HPEntityInterface,​HPLocation> HPAction.getEntitymanager()
      Returns the EntityManager which keeps track of HPEntities and their HPLocations
      static EntityManager<HPEntityInterface,​HPLocation> HPWorld.getEntitymanager()
      Returns the EntityManager which keeps track of the HPEntities and HPLocations in HPWorld.
      EntityManager<HPEntityInterface,​HPLocation> HPWorld.getEntityManager()
      This is only here for compliance with the abstract base class's interface and is not supposed to be called.
      static EntityManager<HPEntityInterface,​HPLocation> HPWorld.myEntitymanager​(HPEntityInterface e)
      Returns the EntityManager which keeps track of the HPEntities and HPLocations in HPWorld.
      Methods in harrypotter with parameters of type HPEntityInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Location HPWorld.find​(HPEntityInterface e)
      Returns the Location of a HPEntity in this grid, null if not found.
      static EntityManager<HPEntityInterface,​HPLocation> HPWorld.myEntitymanager​(HPEntityInterface e)
      Returns the EntityManager which keeps track of the HPEntities and HPLocations in HPWorld.
      void HPActor.setItemCarried​(HPEntityInterface target)
      Assigns this HPActor's itemCarried to a new item target
      abstract void Spell.spellEffect​(HPEntityInterface theTarget)
      Abstract method that contains the effect of the Spell.

    • Uses of HPEntityInterface in harrypotter.spells

      Methods in harrypotter.spells with parameters of type HPEntityInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AvadaKedavra.spellEffect​(HPEntityInterface theTarget)
      Method that carries out the effect of AvadaKedavra, which casts a HPEntityInterface to a HPActor and deal damage equivalent to the HPActor's hit points.
      void Expelliarmus.spellEffect​(HPEntityInterface theTarget)
      Method that carries out the effect of Expelliarmus, which explicitly casts a HPEntityInterface to a HPActor and use the Leave action to make it drop its item.
